CustomObject.description: Custom metadata defining follow-up rules for automated onboarding communications (SMS/Email/In-App). Each rule specifies trigger conditions, communication channel/template, delay schedules, escalation steps, and fatigue controls. Example: A Follow_Up_Rule with DeveloperName="Requirement_Incomplete_7_Days" might have Follow_Up_Type__c="Email", Trigger_Condition__c="Onboarding_Requirement__c.Status__c = 'Incomplete' AND Days_Since_Created__c >= 7", Initial_Delay_Days__c=7, and Escalation_Schedule__c JSON defining retry at days 14, 21, and 30. When trigger conditions are met, the system creates Follow_Up_Queue__c records that are processed by scheduled jobs. Rules can specify fatigue limits (Max_Attempts_Per_Window__c) to prevent over-messaging and can be suppressed during holidays via Follow_Up_Suppression__mdt.
CustomObject.label: Follow Up Rule
